points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

case.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
case.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

case.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

points.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

case.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
case.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

case.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
case.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

points.title: You must create an account to use this service

case.title: You must create an account to use this service
case.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it

points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

case.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
case.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.

points.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service

case.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
case.description: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the services. The legal guardians are responsible for the use of the service by the minor.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 18 years old

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (San Francisco, California, USA)

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.

points.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

case.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
case.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.

case.title: Private messages can be read
case.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.

points.title: You must provide your identifiable information

case.title: You must provide your identifiable information
case.description: The Service requires users to provide their identifiable information, including phone number, iD number or other information, even though this data collection isn’t essential for the purposes of the service. They may still allow pseudonyms in the foreground.

points.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

case.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
case.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: You must provide your identifiable information

case.title: You must provide your identifiable information
case.description: The Service requires users to provide their identifiable information, including phone number, iD number or other information, even though this data collection isn’t essential for the purposes of the service. They may still allow pseudonyms in the foreground.
